subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Trailing by 5-2 in the first set yesterday against Daniela Hantuchova, Serena Williams received a second wind from the United States Open crowd and outlasted Hantuchova, 7-5, 6-3.
snippet: Trailing by 5-2 in the first set yesterday against Daniela Hantuchova, Serena Williams received a second wind from the United States Open crowd and outlasted Hantuchova, 7-5, 6-3.
